*div1 type="summary"* *p*Ignacio de Arispe to---------, December 21, 1827. Certifying the high character and loyalty of Austin.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*I, the *person_mentioned*citizen Ignacio de Arispe*/person_mentioned*, hereby duly certify: That during the time I was *person_mentioned*governor pro:tem*/person_mentioned*, of this *location_mentioned*State*/location_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*citizen Stephen F. Austin, empresario*/person_mentioned* of a colony in the *location_mentioned*department of Texas*/location_mentioned*, obtained the highest opinion from the Government for his honor, love to his country and perfect discharge of the duties of his enterprise—*/p*
*p*The same *person_mentioned*citizen Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* contributed most eficaciously placing himself at the head of his *person_mentioned*colonists */person_mentioned*in beating the *person_mentioned*rebels */person_mentioned*of *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned*in the *date_mentioned n="01-xx-1827">month of January of the present year*/date_mentioned*, having united his *person_mentioned*forces */person_mentioned*to the *person_mentioned*Mexican troops*/person_mentioned* by which movement their dispersion was obtained, and the death of several of their *person_mentioned*ringleaders*/person_mentioned*, by which the order and tranquility of the *location_mentioned*frontier */location_mentioned*were restored.*/p*
*p*And I give the present document for the purposes of the interested person in the Villa of *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*on the *date_mentioned n="12-21-1827">21st Dec'r 1827*/date_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*Signd *person_mentioned*Ignacio de Arispe*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
